name: dub
description: Dub is an open-source link management and URL shortening platform. It supports branded links, analytics, workspaces, and API access, offering a privacy-friendly alternative to commercial link management tools.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track detailed click statistics including geographic location, device types, and referrer information

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Organize links into separate workspaces for different projects, teams, or clients

features.title: Qr Code Generation
features.description: Automatically generate QR codes for shortened links with customizable styling and branding

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Secure sensitive links with password requirements before allowing access to destinations

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Create, edit, and manage multiple links simultaneously through CSV import and batch processing
